abilities.name: Frenzied Escape
abilities.effect: When this Doduo retreats, hold this card and throw it as hard as you can because Doduo is running away. Throw the card horizontally with a snap to get the farthest distance!

attacks.name: Harmonize
attacks.effect: From the moment you use this attack, you must begin to sing a song. (While the song is being sung, the game continues.) When the song is finished, this attack does 30 damage.
